targets.query:
from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "n_users"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "processes" and
    r._field =~ /running|idle|sleeping|wait|blocked|zombies/
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> last()

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field =~ /load1|load5|load15/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime_format"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "pf" and
    r._field =~ /match|state-mismatch|state-insert/
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
  |> last()

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.device != "devfs" and
    r.device =~ /^${Disk:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "disk" and
    r._field == "used_percent"
  )

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    r._field == "used_percent"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.sensor =~ /^${Sensor:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "temperature" and
    r._field == "degrees"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every:10s, fn: mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
interface:$iface AND src_ip:$src_ip AND dst_port:$dst_port AND action:"block"
interface:$iface AND src_ip:$src_ip AND action:"block"
action:"block" AND interface:$iface AND src_ip:$src_ip AND dst_port:$dst_port
interface:$iface AND src_ip:$src_ip AND dst_port:$dst_port AND action:"block"
interface:$iface AND src_ip:$src_ip AND action:"block"

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.gateway_name =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "gateways" and
    r._field == "delay"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "interface"
  )
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> keep(columns: ["friendlyname", "ip4_address", "mac_address", "name", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns:["name"])

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.gateway_name =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "gateways" and
    r._field == "loss"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn:mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket:"opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "gateways" and
    r._field =~ /gwdescr|source|monitor|status|gateway_name|interface/
    )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.name =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "interface" and
    r._field == "status")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["friendlyname", "ip4_address", "name", "mac_address", "_value"])

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.interface =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/ and 
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /bytes_recv|bytes_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> derivative(unit:1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: r._value * 8.0
    })
  )
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.interface =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /bytes_recv|bytes_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.interface =~ /^${WAN:regex}$/ and 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /packets_recv|packets_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> derivative(unit:1s)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.name =~ /^${LAN:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "interface" and
    r._field == "status")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["friendlyname", "ip4_address", "name", "mac_address", "_value"])

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.interface =~ /^${LAN:regex}$/ and 
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /bytes_recv|bytes_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> derivative(unit:1s)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: r._value * 8.0
    })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.interface =~ /^${LAN:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /bytes_recv|bytes_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.interface =~ /^${LAN:regex}$/ and 
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    r._field =~ /packets_recv|packets_sent/
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: first)
  |> derivative(unit:1s)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "opnsense")
|> range(start: -24h)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "pf")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["host"])
|> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: OPNsense
list.name: Host
list.query:
from(bucket: "opnsense")
|> range(start: -24h)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "pf")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["host"])
|> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "opnsense")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and
  r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["device"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["device"])
  |> distinct(column: "device")
list.name: Disk
